name: Scrooge
description: The miserly owner of a London counting-house, a nineteenth century term for an accountant's office.

name: Fred
description: Scrooge's nephew, a genial man who loves Christmas. He invites Scrooge to his Christmas party each and every year, only to be refused by his grumpy uncle.

name: Bob_Cratchit
description: Scrooge's clerk, a kind, mild, and very poor man with a large family.

name: Mrs._Cratchit
description: Bob's wife, a kind and loving woman.

name: Tiny_Tim
description: Bob Cratchit's young son, crippled from birth.

name: Peter_Cratchit
description: Bob's oldest son, who inherits his father's stiff-collared shirt for Christmas.

name: Martha_Cratchit
description: Bob's oldest daughter, who works in a milliner's shop.

name: the_Ghost_of_Christmas_Past
description: The first spirit to visit Scrooge, a curiously childlike apparition with a glowing head.

name: the_Ghost_of_Christmas_Present
description: The second spirit to visit Scrooge, a majestic giant clad in a green robe.

name: the_Ghost_of_Christmas_Yet_to_Come
aliases: the Ghost of Christmas Yet to Come
description: The third and final spirit to visit Scrooge, a silent phantom clad in a hooded black robe.

name: Fan
description: Scrooge's sister; Fred's mother. In Scrooge's vision of Christmases past, he remembers Fan picking him up from school and walking him home.

name: Fezziwig
description: The jovial merchant with whom the young Scrooge apprenticed. Fezziwig was renowned for his wonderful Christmas parties.

name: Belle
description: A beautiful woman who Scrooge loved deeply when he was a young man. Belle broke off their engagement after Scrooge became consumed with greed and the lust for wealth. She later married another man.
